html:
<div class="comment-au__wrapper"><style>/**
 * Shared import file
 * Description: Common components to be used across all thrashers
 */
/**
 * `animation` prefixer.
 *
 * @param {*} $args
 *
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/animation animation on MDN
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * `animation-delay` prefixer.
 *
 * @param {*} $args
 *
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/animation-delay animation-delay on MDN
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * `animation-duration` prefixer.
 *
 * @param {*} $args
 *
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/animation-duration animation-delay on MDN
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * `background-size` prefixer.
 *
 * @param {Arglist} $args
 *
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/background-size background-size on MDN
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * `border-radius` prefixer.
 *
 * @param {Number} $radius (5px)
 *
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-radius border-radius on MDN
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * `box-shadow` prefixer.
 *
 * @param {Arglist} $args
 *
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/box-shadow box-shadow on MDN
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * `box-sizing` prefixer.
 *
 * @param {String} $box
 *
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/box-sizing box-sizing on MDN
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * `column-width` prefixer. Uses `rem` if defined.
 *
 * @param {String} $box
 *
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/column-width column-width on MDN
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * `flex` prefixer.
 *
 * @param {Number}          $flex-grow   (0)
 * @param {Number}          $flex-shring (1)
 * @param {Number | String} $flex-basis  (auto)
 *
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/flex flex on MDN
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * `flex-direction` prefixer.
 *
 * @param {String} $direction row | row-reverse | column | column-reverse
 *
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/flex-direction flex-direction on MDN
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * `flex-basis` prefixer.
 *
 * @param {Number | String} $value (auto)
 *
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/flex-basis flex-basis on MDN
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * `display: flex` prefixer.
 *
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/flex flex on MDN
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * `flex-grow` prefixer.
 *
 * @param {Number} $value (0)
 *
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/flex-grow flex-grow on MDN
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * `@keyframes` prefixer.
 *
 * @param {String} $name
 *
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/@keyframes @keyframes on MDN
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * `transform: rotate()` prefixer.
 *
 * @param {Number} $angle
 *
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/transform#rotate transform: rotate() on MDN
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * `position: sticky` prefixer.
 * Support is very limited but should be used in iOS.
 * Note that Blink temporarily dropped support until they get their
 * "scrolling and compositing house in order"
 *
 * @link http://updates.html5rocks.com/2012/08/Stick-your-landings-position-sticky-lands-in-WebKit position: sticky on WebKit
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/position#Sticky_positioning position: sticky on MDN
 * @link https://code.google.com/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=231752 Meta bug for position: sticky on Chromium's tracker
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * `transform` prefixer.
 *
 * @param {*} $args
 *
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/transform transform on MDN
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * `transform-origin` prefixer.
 *
 * @param {*} $args
 *
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/transform-origin transform-origin on MDN
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * `transition` prefixer.
 * Do not use when transitionning prefixed properties
 * to avoid impossible code like `-moz-transition: -webkit-border-radius 1s`.
 *
 * @param {Arglist} $args
 *
 * @link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/transition transition on MDN
 * 
 * @group css3
 */
/**
 * Full Width Presentation
 * Description: Removes properties from the container to make the snap appear full-width
 */
/**
 * Rule
 * Description: Place a rule on top of the thrasher on all breakpoints
 */
.comment-au__wrapper {
  width: 100%;
  background-color: #eae8e3;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden; }
  @media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
    .comment-au__wrapper {
      padding-top: 4px;
      padding-left: 20px;
      padding-right: 20px; } }

/* Content and Type */
.comment-au__content, .comment-au__article {
  position: relative;
  width: 36%;
  font-family: "Guardian Egyptian Web", "Guardian Text Egyptian Web", Georgia, serif;
  float: left; }
  @media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
    .comment-au__content, .comment-au__article {
      height: 160px; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 61.25em) {
    .comment-au__content, .comment-au__article {
      height: 200px; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 71.25em) {
    .comment-au__content, .comment-au__article {
      height: 230px; } }

.comment-au__title {
  color: #ffffff;
  font-size: 20px;
  line-height: 24px;
  font-weight: 500; }
  @media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
    .comment-au__title {
      font-size: 26px;
      line-height: 30px;
      font-weight: 200;
      color: #e6711b; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 61.25em) {
    .comment-au__title {
      font-size: 36px;
      line-height: 36px; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 71.25em) {
    .comment-au__title {
      font-size: 44px;
      line-height: 44px; } }
  @media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
    .comment-au__title br {
      display: none; } }

.comment-au__standfirst {
  font-size: 16px;
  line-height: 20px; }
  @media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
    .comment-au__standfirst {
      font-weight: 200; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 61.25em) {
    .comment-au__standfirst {
      font-size: 20px;
      line-height: 24px; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 71.25em) {
    .comment-au__standfirst {
      font-size: 28px;
      line-height: 32px; } }

@media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
  .comment-au__content, .comment-au__article, .comment-au__contributors__wrapper {
    width: 100%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    padding: 2px 20px 0;
    float: none; } }
@media all and (max-width: 29.99em) {
  .comment-au__content, .comment-au__article, .comment-au__contributors__wrapper {
    padding: 2px 10px 0; } }

@media all and (min-width: 41.25em) and (max-width: 46.24em) {
  .comment-au__content .comment-au__title, .comment-au__standfirst, .comment-au__contributors__wrapper {
    max-width: 620px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-left: 0; }
 }

@media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
  .comment-au__content {
    padding-bottom: 16px;
    background-color: #e6711b;
    color: #333; } }

.button.comment-au__button {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  color: #e6711b;
  border-color: #e6711b;
  background-color: transparent; }
  @media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
    .button.comment-au__button {
      display: none; } }
  .button.comment-au__button:hover {
    color: #ffffff;
    border-color: #e6711b;
    background-color: #e6711b; }
    .button.comment-au__button:hover .comment-au__button__icon path {
      fill: #ffffff; }

.button.comment-au__button:hover {
  color: #ffffff;
  border-color: #e6711b;
  background-color: #e6711b; }

.comment-au__button__icon {
  display: inline-block;
  vertical-align: middle;
  margin-left: 2px; }
  .comment-au__button__icon path {
    fill: #e6711b; }

/* Articles */
.comment-au__article, .comment-au__link--mobile {
  display: none; }
  .comment-au__article .comment-au__title, .comment-au__link--mobile .comment-au__title {
    color: #333;
    font-family: "Guardian Egyptian Web", "Guardian Text Egyptian Web", Georgia, serif;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 20px; }
    @media all and (min-width: 30em) {
      .comment-au__article .comment-au__title, .comment-au__link--mobile .comment-au__title {
        font-size: 20px;
        line-height: 24px; } }
    @media all and (min-width: 61.25em) {
      .comment-au__article .comment-au__title, .comment-au__link--mobile .comment-au__title {
        font-size: 28px;
        line-height: 32px; } }
    .comment-au__article .comment-au__title:before, .comment-au__link--mobile .comment-au__title:before {
      content: "";
      display: inline-block;
      width: 1.25em;
      height: 0.7em;
      margin-right: 0.1em;
      vertical-align: baseline;
      background-size: contain;
      background-image: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
      background-repeat: no-repeat;
      background-position: 0 0; }
    .comment-au__article .comment-au__title .comment-au__byline, .comment-au__link--mobile .comment-au__title .comment-au__byline {
      display: block;
      color: #e6711b; }
  .comment-au__article .comment-au__tagline, .comment-au__link--mobile .comment-au__tagline {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    padding-right: 40px;
    margin-bottom: 0;
    color: #767676;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 18px; }
    @media all and (min-width: 61.25em) {
      .comment-au__article .comment-au__tagline, .comment-au__link--mobile .comment-au__tagline {
        font-size: 16px;
        line-height: 20px;
        padding-right: 80px; } }

/* Cutouts */
@media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
  .comment-au__contributors__wrapper {
    -ms-overflow-style: none;
    overflow-x: scroll;
    overflow-x: -moz-scrollbars-none;
    -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch; }
    .comment-au__contributors__wrapper::-webkit-scrollbar {
      display: none; } }
@media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
  .comment-au__contributors__wrapper {
    position: relative;
    margin-bottom: -3px;
    width: 64%;
    float: left;
    height: 170px; } }
@media all and (min-width: 61.25em) {
  .comment-au__contributors__wrapper {
    height: 220px; } }
@media all and (min-width: 71.25em) {
  .comment-au__contributors__wrapper {
    height: 250px; } }

.comment-au__contributors {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  list-style: none; }
  @media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
    .comment-au__contributors {
      width: 440%; } }
  @media all and (max-width: 29.99em) {
    .comment-au__contributors {
      width: 400%; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
    .comment-au__contributors {
      position: absolute;
      bottom: 0;
      right: 0;
      width: 100%;
      float: right; } }

.comment-au__contributor {
  line-height: 0;
  float: left;
  position: relative;
  width: 20%; }
  @media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
    .comment-au__contributor {
      height: 160px;
      overflow: hidden; } }
  @media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
    .comment-au__contributor img {
      position: absolute;
      right: -8%;
      bottom: -10%;
      width: auto;
      height: 120%; } }
  @media all and (max-width: 29.99em) {
    .comment-au__contributor img {
      height: 100%;
      right: -20%; } }
  @media all and (max-width: 19.99em) {
    .comment-au__contributor img {
      height: 80%;
      right: -18%; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
    .comment-au__contributor img {
      height: auto;
      width: 235%;
      margin-left: -70%; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 81.25em) {
    .comment-au__contributor img {
      width: 205%; } }

.comment-au__link--katharine-murphy:hover ~ .comment-au__article--katharine-murphy {
  display: block; }
.comment-au__link--katharine-murphy:hover ~ .comment-au__content {
  display: none; }
.comment-au__link--katharine-murphy:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--katharine-murphy {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-au__link--katharine-murphy:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--lenore-taylor {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-au__link--katharine-murphy:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--first-dog {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-au__link--katharine-murphy:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--david-marr {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-au__link--katharine-murphy:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--richard-ackland {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-au__link--katharine-murphy:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--katharine-murphy {
  -webkit-filter: none;
  filter: none; }

.comment-au__link--lenore-taylor:hover ~ .comment-au__article--lenore-taylor {
  display: block; }
.comment-au__link--lenore-taylor:hover ~ .comment-au__content {

  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-au__link--lenore-taylor:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--first-dog {

.comment-au__link--lenore-taylor:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--david-marr {

  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-au__link--lenore-taylor:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--richard-ackland {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-au__link--lenore-taylor:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--lenore-taylor {

  filter: none; }

.comment-au__link--first-dog:hover ~ .comment-au__article--first-dog {
  display: block; }
.comment-au__link--first-dog:hover ~ .comment-au__content {
  display: none; }
.comment-au__link--first-dog:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--katharine-murphy {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-au__link--first-dog:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--lenore-taylor {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-au__link--first-dog:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--first-dog {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-au__link--first-dog:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--david-marr {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-au__link--first-dog:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--richard-ackland {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-au__link--first-dog:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--first-dog {
  -webkit-filter: none;
  filter: none; }

.comment-au__link--david-marr:hover ~ .comment-au__article--david-marr {
  display: block; }
.comment-au__link--david-marr:hover ~ .comment-au__content {
  display: none; }
.comment-au__link--david-marr:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--katharine-murphy {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-au__link--david-marr:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--lenore-taylor {

  display: none; }
.comment-au__link--richard-ackland:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--katharine-murphy {

  filter: grayscale(100%); }

  filter: grayscale(100%); }

  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }

  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-au__link--richard-ackland:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--richard-ackland {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-au__link--richard-ackland:hover ~ .comment-au__contributors__wrapper .comment-au__contributor--richard-ackland {
  -webkit-filter: none;
  filter: none; }

/* Links */
@media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
  a.comment-au__link {
    display: none; } }
@media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
  a.comment-au__link {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    width: 12.8%;
    margin-left: 33%;
    z-index: 20 !important;
    display: block; } }

a.comment-au__link:nth-of-type(2) {
  margin-left: 45.8%; }

@media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
  .comment-au__contributor:nth-of-type(2) .comment-au__title {
    padding-left: 10px; }

  .comment-au__contributor:nth-of-type(2):before {
    content: "";
    background-color: #ccc;
    width: 1px;
    float: left;
    position: absolute;
    top: 3px;
    bottom: 3px;
    left: 0; }
 }

a.comment-au__link:nth-of-type(3) {
  margin-left: 58.6%; }

@media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
  .comment-au__contributor:nth-of-type(3) .comment-au__title {
    padding-left: 10px; }

  .comment-au__contributor:nth-of-type(3):before {
    content: "";
    background-color: #ccc;
    width: 1px;
    float: left;
    position: absolute;
    top: 3px;
    bottom: 3px;
    left: 0; }
 }

a.comment-au__link:nth-of-type(4) {
  margin-left: 71.4%; }

@media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
  .comment-au__contributor:nth-of-type(4) .comment-au__title {
    padding-left: 10px; }

  .comment-au__contributor:nth-of-type(4):before {
    content: "";
    background-color: #ccc;
    width: 1px;
    float: left;
    position: absolute;
    top: 3px;
    bottom: 3px;
    left: 0; }
 }

a.comment-au__link:nth-of-type(5) {
  margin-left: 84.2%; }

@media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
  .comment-au__contributor:nth-of-type(5) .comment-au__title {
    padding-left: 10px; }

  .comment-au__contributor:nth-of-type(5):before {
    content: "";
    background-color: #ccc;
    width: 1px;
    float: left;
    position: absolute;
    top: 3px;
    bottom: 3px;
    left: 0; }
 }

a.comment-au__link--mobile {
  display: block; }
  @media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
    a.comment-au__link--mobile {
      display: none; } }
  a.comment-au__link--mobile .comment-au__title {
    width: 60%;
    margin-bottom: 48px;
    font-weight: 400; }

/* Facia Stuff */
#comment-au {
  background-color: #eae8e3;
  border-top: 0;
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  padding-bottom: 0; }
  @media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
    #comment-au {
      border-top: 1px solid #333; } }

#comment-au .fc-container__inner {
  border-top: none;
  padding-top: 0px; }
  @media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
    #comment-au .fc-container__inner {
      margin-left: 0;
      margin-right: 0;
      width: 100%; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
    #comment-au .fc-container__inner {
      border-top: 1px solid #e6711b; } }

#comment-au .fc-container__header {
  display: none; }

#comment-au .fc-slice {
  margin: 0;
  width: 100%; }

#comment-au .fc-slice-item {
  width: 100%; }

.has-no-flex-wrap #comment-au .comment-au__wrapper {
  width: 96%; }

#comment-au .fc-slice-wrapper {
  margin-left: 0;
  margin-right: 0; }
  @media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
    #comment-au .fc-slice-wrapper {
      margin-left: -20px;
      margin-right: -20px; } }

#comment-au .fc-slice__item {
  margin-bottom: 0px !important;
  width: 100%; }

#comment-au .fc-container__body {
  margin-left: 0;
  padding-top: 0;
  padding-bottom: 0;
